name: Creativity & Innovation
description: Exercises to spark creative thinking and innovative solutions.

cards.title: Role Reversal
cards.description: Switch perspectives by imagining yourself as the user/client/audience. What would you want or need in their position?
cards.instructions:
1. List your assumptions about the current situation
2. Imagine yourself in the other person's role
3. Note what feels different or surprising
4. Identify new insights or opportunities

cards.title: Time Travel
cards.description: Consider your challenge from different time periods - past, present and future. How does temporal distance change your view?
cards.instructions:
1. Describe your challenge in present terms
2. Imagine it 50 years ago - what changes?
3. Project 50 years ahead - what evolves?
4. Extract insights from each timeframe

cards.title: Outsider View
cards.description: Examine your challenge as if you're from a completely different field or industry. What would they notice or do differently?
cards.instructions:
1. Pick an unrelated field/profession
2. List their typical approaches
3. Apply their methods to your challenge
4. Note novel insights

cards.title: Micro/Macro Lens
cards.description: Zoom in to examine tiny details, then zoom out for the big picture. How does scale change your understanding?
cards.instructions:
1. List the smallest details of your challenge
2. Examine broader context and systems
3. Note relationships between scales
4. Identify overlooked opportunities

cards.title: Random Fusion
cards.description: Combine two unrelated objects or ideas. What new possibilities emerge from their intersection?
cards.instructions:
1. Choose two random items/concepts
2. List key attributes of each
3. Find unexpected connections
4. Generate hybrid solutions

cards.title: Cross-Cultural Blend
cards.description: Mix elements from different cultures or traditions. How do these combinations create something new?
cards.instructions:
1. Select two distinct cultures
2. Identify unique aspects of each
3. Explore meaningful combinations
4. Develop hybrid concepts

cards.title: Tech-Nature Fusion
cards.description: Merge technological and natural elements. What innovations arise from this blend?
cards.instructions:
1. Choose a technology and natural process
2. Analyze their core functions
3. Find complementary aspects
4. Create bio-inspired solutions

cards.title: Rule Reversal
cards.description: Identify and deliberately break conventional rules or assumptions. What becomes possible?
cards.instructions:
1. List assumed constraints
2. Challenge each assumption
3. Explore opposite approaches
4. Develop unconventional solutions

cards.title: Constraint Addition
cards.description: Add unusual constraints to force new thinking patterns. How do limitations spark creativity?
cards.instructions:
1. Add three random constraints
2. Work within these limits
3. Note how restrictions drive innovation
4. Refine best ideas

cards.title: Process Shuffle
cards.description: Rearrange the typical order of steps or elements. What insights emerge from disruption?
cards.instructions:
1. Map current process
2. Randomly reorder steps
3. Explore new sequences
4. Identify improvements
